1.title: Baccalaureate
1.desc: Engineering Sciences and Technologies (STI), electronics specialization

self-taught.line1: 2010 : Mobile application (Stop Cigarette) developed for Android and Windows Phone 8.1. Fourth winner of challenge Nokia – SUPINFO 2012
self-taught.line2: 2012 : Android application (iControl iTunes) designed to control iTunes with an HMI optimized for tablet and another for mobile
self-taught.line4: 2015 - Now : Associative project. Online library application. Android (Java), iOS (Swift), Angular, Java, Spring, AWS

beepeers.title: Android developer
beepeers.line1: Developments on the proprietary (Beepeers) Android framework
beepeers.line2: Customer graphical design integration and configuration of modules purchased by the customer

capgemini.title: Software engineer
capgemini.line1: Self-directed development of a native mobile application iOS, Android, Windows Phone (C#, Java, Swift) for a local sports games organization based at Sophia-Antipolis (France)
capgemini.line2: Development of multiple webapps (C#, ASP.NET MVC) and an Android (Java) application for an elevator provider
capgemini.line3: Developments on a GDS solution (Train) with an Agile context (Java, Aria Templates)
capgemini.line4: TMA of a Property Management System solution (Java / Struts / .NET WPF / Delphi)
capgemini.line5: Development of an ASP.NET MVC application and a Windows 8.1 tablet application with an Agile context for a cleaning company designed to manage incidents

mytower.title: Design and development engineer
mytower.line1: Developer and technical lead on the MyTower software solution (Angular, Spring)
mytower.line2: Implementation of optimization algorithms (NP and VRP using OptaPlanner)
mytower.line3: Scrum Master, Agile team management, User Story writing, Jira workflow configuration
mytower.line4: Technical analysis and integration of customer requirement (such as Airbus, Chanel)
mytower.line5: Self-directed development of an Outlook plugin designed to extract mail attachments and split PDF (C#, WPF, VSTO)
mytower.line6: Deployments management and continuous integration (Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, Gerrit, SonarQube)
